ai-iti60:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti60:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three grounds for making merit.
ai-iti60:2.3_0: Giving, ethical conduct, and meditation are all grounds for making merit.
ai-iti60:2.4_0: These are the three grounds for making merit.”
ai-iti60:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti60:3.4_0: My mind is immersed in samādhi.
ai-iti60:4.3_0: Such an astute person is reborn
ai-iti60:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
